name: Starter Templates by Gradient Themes
author: gradientthemes

sections.description:
Setup your site theme from Gradient Themes site with template library dummy data easily. Import settings, widgets and content with one click. Gradient Sterter Templates requires Advanced Import Plugin to work normally.

While you use Gradient Sterter Templates to import demo starter site, Images and demo files are fetches from respected theme Demo Sites form Gradient Themes. This helps you to import starter dmeo site with a single click. You must accept terms and privacy to use Gradient Sterter Templates Plugin.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘gradient-starter-templates’
  3. Activate Gradient Sterter Templates from Appearance > Plugins
  4. Go to the Appearance -> Demo Import
  5. Use available demo import

From WordPress.org

  1. Download gradient-starter-templates.zip
  2. Upload the ‘gradient-starter-templates’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate gradient-starter-templates from your Appearance > Plugins page.
  4. Go to the Appearance -> Demo Import
  5. Use available demo import
sections.faq:
I have activated the plugin. Where to find the plugin page to import data?

You will find the import page in wp-admin -> Appearance -> Demo Import.

Got the issues on the plugin?

If you have the issues on the plugin Visit Support Page, so that we can solve the issues.
